oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (2 projects) concerns research on feeding and health of sheeps and pigs. The first project concerns the installation of a research plateform in sheep flocks on organic farming. The second project concerns the analysis of nutritional values of raw materials and feedings in pig breeding.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio I: Animal husbandry. Runs 2001 - 2003. Programme Leader(s): Benoît, Marc; Cluzeau, D. and Pérès, G..
